scripts.bootstrap: lerna bootstrap --hoist --nohoist webpack && cd demo && sh ./populate-demo-fs.sh
scripts.changelog: docker run -it --rm -v "$(pwd)":/usr/local/src/your-app ockvolkovich/github-changelog-generator -u OpusCapita -p filemanager --token $CHANGELOG_GITHUB_TOKEN && git add ./CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m "Update CHANGELOG.md [ci skip]"
scripts.publish: lerna publish --exact --yes && npm run changelog && git push
